params.dealId: The disputed deal whose timeout has elapsed

params.params: The deal parameters (counterparty, amount, yield split, timeout, deal hash)

params.lifiData: Encoded LI.FI bridge data (empty for same-chain)
Encoded LI.FI bridge data (empty for same-chain)

params.preferredToken: The token counterparty wants their yield in
The token counterparty wants their yield in

claimTimeout(uint256).notice: Claim timeout refund after dispute period expires

disputeDeal(uint256).notice: Mark a funded deal as disputed, starting the timeout clock

fundDeal(uint256).notice: Fund an existing deal by depositing tokens into the yield adapter

getAccruedYield(uint256).notice: Get accrued yield for a deal

settleDeal(uint256,bytes).notice: Settle a funded deal via same-chain or LI.FI cross-chain routing

settleDealSigned(uint256,bytes,bytes,byt.notice: Settle with EIP-712 dual signatures from both parties

settleDealWithHook(uint256,address).notice: Settle a deal with yield swapped via v4 hook to counterparty's preferred token

settleDealWithHookSigned(uint256,address.notice: Settle with hook using EIP-712 dual signatures
